page.title: 17Darwen Stations & Tunnel
page.content: Darwen Station is now the only manned station between the larger towns of Blackburn and Bolton.There used to be a station at Spring Vale,which closed in 1958.Spring Vale station opened in 1847,the year in which the line from Blackburn to Sough was completed. The 1850 metre long Slough Tunnel was opened a year later in 1848.Tunneling had been carried out from both ends. Five people died during construction.The youngest of these was 12 year old Billy Godbhere,who was knocked down the deepest of 13 shafts which had been sunk to remove material from the tunnel.
